log 2022.09.05 MC

2022.09

MC statistical thermodynamic simulations

  1. Electronic / ionic relaxation.

  2. CE fitting for ECI.

  3. Hamiltonian estimation of atomic configuration input for MC steps.

3.1. For Monte Carlo simulation: $<\alpha>$ represents canonical ensemble average.

3.2. For Molecular Dynamics simulation: $<\alpha>$ could be approximated as time average.

  1. Reach the convergence.

2022.10

k点采样数太大了，当初做下convergence test该多好.jpg，导致到现在才200个数据点。

不管，先拟合一下ECI。用了经典CE跟简单的全连接网络，后者加了一些常见tricks，不作赘述。
